Description: Test that numerical values (like '1') return the default '0' value in Soundex conversion.
Test that the Soundex code for "India" is properly generated.
Test that the Soundex code for "Pooja" is correctly generated.
Test that the Soundex function handles alphanumeric input correctly by ignoring digits and converting letters.
Test that the Soundex handles inputs starting with numbers, returning the appropriate Soundex code for the input.
Test that Soundex code generation works for a string with fewer than four characters.
Test that the Soundex function handles an empty string as input and returns an empty string.
Test that consonants are correctly replaced by the appropriate digits in the Soundex algorithm.
